categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Cards" was the nickname of an Advanced Recon Commando Commander who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

A clone of the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett, Cards was an Advanced Recon Commando who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. While positioned at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, Cards was in charge of tournaments of the card game, "Card Commander", which was popular among clone troopers during the war.

Cards wore modified Phase II clone trooper armor of the ARC trooper variant, which included addition chest armor, a pauldron with extra ammunition pouch, and a leather kama, all painted in the color black. Cards's helmet featured an advanced heads-up display, and side-mounted rangefinder.
